summary: An astute and experienced strategic and operational senior executive with proven success in developing, resourcing, managing and monitoring multi-million dollar programs and initiatives in higher education, social services and workforce development. A critical thinker and adept fiscal analyst who can apply an extensive knowledge of government policy and regulations to meeting community needs by delivering financially sound programs.  An excellent communicator who effectively engages a diverse variety of internal and external stakeholders.  Possessing a keen interest in science with an appreciation of its ability to bring forth an understanding of both the elegantly simple as well as the infinitely complex. Published author with additional expertise in:Strategic Planning and Budgeting	Strategic CollaborationPolicy Analysis	Economic DevelopmentContract AdministrationMedia Relations	Organizational Revitalization	Federal ComplianceFederal/Congressional/State RelationsWorkforce Education and Training Programs	Performance ManagementFacility Planning, Design, Construction and Management	Governance and Board ManagementProgram and Fiscal AuditsPhilanthropy
